SIB Infotech – A Full Service Influencer Marketing Agency In India

Influencers are considered to be the most reliable assets to create awareness and grow your brand on online or social media platforms via their social media handles, blogs or channels. The influencers have a huge mass of audience followers that can be leveraged by influencer marketing to create potential future customers for your business. To great a buzz for your brand you would need top influencers to make a noise which could be heard loud by your target audience.

The aspects and effects of influencer marketing is growing far more rapidly than any advertising or marketing tactics such as digital ads. The greatest benefit of implementing influencer marketing for your company is that the audience is already present on their platforms, you just need to establish a knife-sharp partnership with the influencer where both of the parties are providing exclusive benefits to the audience.

Influencers are a medium to drive immense traffic to your website and build engagement around your products and brand. They are responsible for creating authentic and appealing content about your business that is exhibited to their followers. They establish easily discoverable positive product reviews which boosts online and in-store product sales.

We believe your success is our success

We believe in delivering top influencer marketing services with utmost perfection that has resulted in worldwide 750+ happy and satisfied clients.

Why you need SIB Infotech Influencer Marketing Services?

Influencer marketing is the future in this digital world as it's the most authentic and consumer focused marketing that performs far better than paid ads because it build credibility for a brand via most followed people on the social media. Influencer marketing is an elite role-player in the social media marketing of your company/ brand to engage fresh onlookers and generate new leads. The benefits from influencer marketing are numerous to any business that wants to implement if for soaring its success to the sky.

Influencer marketing is a complex task for any business although it is an important aspect of marketing. Choosing an efficient influencer marketing company is very crucial to get assured ROI from your expenses. SIB Infotech is among the best influencer marketing companies in India. Our services guarantee 100% effective and efficient results by implementing our marketing strategies.

The industry market is packed with competitors amongst which 89% use influencers to generate authentic content about their brand and 77% use influencers to drive the audience to their websites and increase audience engagement to a great extent.

Influencer Marketing FAQ?

Influencer Marketing is a form of marketing that involves collaborating with Social Media Influencers who share the same ideology and category to inspire the buying decision of their followers. Choosing someone from the same field as your business will help in reaching out to a larger audience with similar interests. Top Influencer Marketing Agency like ours helps in creating unique content and comprehensive strategy for better sales.

Influencer Marketing benefits the brands in several ways while reaching a highly targeted audience. They include:

  • More leads
  • Better conversion rate
  • Better online brand presence
  • Relevant website traffic
  • Brand association leverage

Let's take an example that you want to promote a mobile app and you will target a tech influencer on platforms like Facebook/Instagram where they will share the benefits and features as well as encourage their followers to install the app.

This question can be better explained with an example. For instance, you have a brand that sells cellphones and to make your product reach a larger audience you decide to promote the brand online. Hence, Social Media Platforms like Facebook/Instagram can be promoted through a tech influencer where they will share the features and benefits and encourage their followers to purchase that cellphone.

Yes, Influencer Marketing is beneficial for all types of business whether it is a startup, (Small and Medium-Sized Enterprise) SME, or a large business with limited financial assistance. Influencer Marketing can help achieve better results (maximum reach) due to its cost-effectiveness. Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises (SMEs) can achieve a better online presence through this and in the case of large businesses they can use it to maintain their market share.

Being in the field for 10 years, we have tie-ups with Top Social Media Influencers from India as well as from abroad across all major Social Media Platforms. Hence, Brands can contact us to execute their Influencer Marketing Campaign and promote their products/services.
